scripts.compile:
source ~/.bash_profile
for i in ./wasm/*.c
do
 emcc "$i" -s WASM=1 -s SIDE_MODULE=1 -o "${i%.*}.wasm"
 done
scripts.compile2:
source ~/.bash_profile
for i in ./wasm/*.c
do
f_name_path="${i%.*}"
f_name="${f_name_path##*/}"
 emcc "$i" -s ONLY_MY_CODE=1 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_$f_name']" -o "$f_name_path.js"
 done
